name: Everyday Exploration Merino V-Neck Tee - Men's

features: Made with a hemp blend to create a more environmentally-conscious fabric
Offset shoulder and side seams designed to increase comfort and minimize chafing while wearing a backpack
3 button placket and vent at hem provide classic look
Material Content: 53% Merino Wool, 39% Polyester, 8% Hemp, Exclusive of Decoration
